dublin_core.dcvalue: In this paper we introduce the design of an electrocardiogram ECG collecting circuit based on distance wireless ECG monitor The circuit not only amplifiers the ECG signal and filter but also automatically detects lead fall
Sheng wu yi xue gong cheng xue za zhi = Journal of biomedical engineering = Shengwu yixue gongchengxue zazhi
[The design of electrocardiogram signal collecting circuit based on distance-wireless electrocardiogram monitor].
